short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get a taste of the interconnected web! Try to connect to servers from all around the globe!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ever wonder how many websites you're connecting to? This extension provides an interactive globe which shows all of your connections in real time! Try connecting to as many countries as you can to complete the map or just marvel at the scale of the world wide web!
